name: GET GUD PVP (Alpha 0.1 playable /playable test level)
name_original: GET GUD PVP (Alpha 0.1 playable /playable test level)
description:
Test build of the 1st level of my the game I'm making in Godot called get GUD PVP which is a reboot of the original game i made in Construct 2 called GET GUD which I have also posted on ich.io along with some of my other games.

GET GUD PVP is a game in witch 2 players race to be the 1st player to reach the finish line. In this game speed is your enemy and all surfaces have little to no friction and building off to much speed can often lead to you flying off the map and dying . The aim is to improve as much as possible nd learn all the little tricks in the game that can be exploited to help you win and beat your opponent.
